units.name: Operate Application Software Packages
units.description: This foundational unit introduces students to the essential skills required to effectively use common business application software. Students will learn to navigate, customize, and operate word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, and database applications in a Windows environment.
learning_outcomes: Navigate and customize business application software
Create and format professional documents using word processing software
Manage and manipulate data using spreadsheet applications
Perform basic database operations and queries
Apply file management techniques across multiple applications
units.assessment_requirements: Assessment must include practical demonstration of software operation and portfolio submission showcasing competency in multiple applications
